name: Space Boost
description:
SpaceBoost

A fun space shooter meets racing meets endless runner kind of game with some nice boost effects in store. You can play it without needing to wrestle with any funky game mechanics.  

This is the first game of Code for Joy -  so we are extra thankful for any kind of feedback.  Financial support would help us to polish Space Boost and to create  some more levels. We are planning to include a story mode in which you can complete a  succession of missions towards a spectacular grand final. 

Enjoy !
